categories: Category:Jedi Knights of the Jedi Order
Category:Sith Lords of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Bavik Vannor was a Human male Jedi Knight who fell to the dark side of the Force and joined the Sith Empire. He became one of the three gatekeepers contained within the Tascollan holocron. His holocron gatekeeper believed that the dark side was a great ally and knew a lot about Valik Kodank's past.
